summary: This mod places respawning Frost Giants in the cold parts of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Mod:  Frost Giants in the Cold  1_0
Game:  TES V: Skyrim
Requires:  Dawnguard
Author:  David Brasher             
Date:  9/9/12                   
************************************************************************
CONTENTS                          
************************************************************************
1. Information on the Mod
2. Installation
3. Version History
4. Conflicts, Known Issues, and Troubleshooting
5. Copy Status and Credits
************************************************************************
1. INFORMATION ON THE MOD           
************************************************************************
	   This mod places respawning Frost Giants in the cold parts of Skyrim.

	   These are Frost Giants like the ones seen in Dawnguard, although they are not tied to a 
quest.  They like to live in cold places that are often rather remote.  They like mountain tops,
icy beaches, and islands in the cold sea.

	   They are not too aggressive unless they feel like you are trespassing on their territory.
They usually live alone, but sometimes visit giant camps, or have bears, wolves, or other creatures
as pets.

	   The Frost Giants have their own new spawn points, so there will be no conflict with 
mods that edit leveled lists. 

	   The Frost Giants are not leveled and are rather tough.  If you are low level, you should 
probably keep your distance and avoid angering them.	   
************************************************************************
2. Installation                           
************************************************************************	   
           To install this mod, extract (decompress) the .esp to your Skyrim directory.  
(It will be something like *Installation directory*\\Skyrim\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data)
Mark the box next to the mod in your mod manager.
 
           Alternately, extract someplace else.  Then move the .esp to Skyrim\\Data.  Mark the box 
next to the mod in your mod manager.
************************************************************************
3. Version History    
************************************************************************
V 1.0  9/9/12   Initial release.   
************************************************************************
4. Conflicts, Known Issues, and Troubleshooting
************************************************************************
	   This mod will not conflict with mods that edit leveled lists.

	   This mod will not conflict with the quest in Dawnguard that involves Frost Giants.

	   You can\'t play this mod unless you have Dawnguard.

	   This mod could put a Frost Giant where you do not want one, like if you built yourself
a house mod in a remote and snowy location.  You might have a Frost Giant in your yard, and that 
is never a good thing.	   
	
	   If you locate a bug, contact David Brasher on Skyrim Nexus so that the situation can be
examined and can hopefully be fixed. 
************************************************************************
5. Copy Status and Credits           
************************************************************************
Credits:  Wraithofdoom for mod concept.

	  Bethesda for making Skyrim and Dawnguard in an open format anyone can mod.
		
Copy Status:  Public domain with proper attribution and courtesy notification.         
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
author: David Brasher
